<inner> clean()

Clean expired caches

<inner> cleanIntervalTime(time)

Get or set clean expired caches interval time.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
time
Returns:
Type
number

<inner> decrement(name, value)

Decrement value of a cache, if cache is not exists then create with value and live time as default (CACHE_MEDIUM), if exists then decrement it and set live time as old. If old value isn't a valid numeric then set it to 0
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
name string
value number <optional>
 1 Decrement value
Returns:
Type
number

<inner> expire()

Manual delete expired caches

Parameters:
Name Type Description

Returns:
Type
*

<inner> has(name)

Check if a cached name is exists
Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string
Returns:
Type
boolean

<inner> increment(name, value)

Increment value of a cache, if cache is not exists then create with value and live time as default (CACHE_MEDIUM), if exists then increment it and set live time as old. If old value isn't a valid numeric then set it to 0
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
name string
value number <optional>
 1 Increment value
Returns:
Type
number

<inner> list(name_only)

Get valid caches
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
name_only boolean <optional>
 true Include cache value or not? default is true
Returns:
Type
*

<inner> set(name, value, live_time)

Add cache
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
name string
value *
live_time number <optional>
 M.CACHE_MEDIUM

<inner> touch(name, live_time)

Add live time
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
name string
live_time number <optional>
 Default is cached live time
